OOC: How big are the bat probes because I'm picturing little typical sized 
bats and if they're bigger and should be doing more damage I need to know.

::SkarBlaise::
    He's knocked backwards again and trips over himself landing with a 
resounding thud.  He sits up and grunts getting quite annoyed with these 
pesky probes.  He fires another two missiles at the bot standing there.  He 
didn't know her and didn't care he just wanted to hurt something.  With his 
laser canon he took aim and fired at three of the probes.  He shouts "You are 
strong for one who is so small."
